title: Lost LP to a game i could not reconnect to (NA)
body: I just played a game on 3/13/2017/ around 5:45 A.M. I was in a match as Jhin ADC i was 7/6/6 and I saw all of my teammates disconnect and then i disconnected and so did the enemy team i late found out, problem was I DIDNT get to reconnect and neither did the enemy teams' Jayce. We ended up losing and i got - LP for something i couldnt control, it definitely was not my fault because both of the teams all disconnected and they said they couldnt reconnect for atleast 5 minutes BUT mine Never reconnected, i feel shafted of 20 LP and should atleast got the loss prevented... Please help as soon as possible thanks!

replies.body: I am currently experiencing the same problem as we speak I am sure ill lose LP because of it sucks. hopefully they do something to give us credit for the LP we are losing and now i cant receive loot wtf.

While we are aware that there was a problem causing players to disconnect and left unable to reconnect, adjusting LP is not something that we are able to do. It's unfortunate that our servers encountered this problem, but this is a situation that affected a wide number of summoners. Rest assured that you weren't the only one who had this issue. 

We're still working to help anyone who was affected by the server issues, and you can stay up to date by checking out our post [**here**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/3Lmbjp8Y-3132017-na-server-issues).

UPDATE: I tried to join another game (also ranked) and could not connect.. restarted computer, league, and even my router (3 TIMES!). There was another person on the other team that could not connect also.. both teams remade and luckily didnt lose any LP this time but still pissed about last game and im not going to queue up anymore tonight, please fix this Riot!!
